OOC: And for anyone who saw it, remember "Plague of Insecticons" where
Shrapnel was thrashin Autobots left and right with Electricity. Even if
it didnt get past the armour, it would severly burn it, most likely. I'm
not sure, but just standing on the ground isnt grounding it either, you
need rubber, wood, or glass, and even with those, if there is enough
voltage, it dosent matter if your grounded, it will still dammage things
a little. (IE: trees don't conduct, but if are struck by lightning are
destroyed).



Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> 
> And unless its grounded the Electricity will overload the systems if
> it is prolonged or a powerful enough blast. Much like if a lightning
> bolt hits a generator, it doesnt use that energy, it shorts out or in
> some cases explodes. Im not saying the electricity would short out
> trainwreck in one blast although it is intense, im just saying ti
> should hurt him some amount. Gemini Dragons firepower is rated at a
> 10 I believe...
